summary: Successfully tested all new Bayi (Dealer) Portal features and E-Fatura XML export functionality. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend integration fully functional with complete dealer self-service workflow including login, product browsing, cart management, order placement, and order/invoice tracking. E-Fatura XML export generating valid UBL-TR 1.2 format files.
passed_tests: Dealer Portal Login API (/api/dealer-portal/login) - BY-001 authentication
Dealer Portal Info API (/api/dealer-portal/me) - dealer profile retrieval
Dealer Portal Products API (/api/dealer-portal/products) - product listing with dealer pricing
Dealer Portal Orders API (/api/dealer-portal/orders) - GET and POST operations
Dealer Portal Invoices API (/api/dealer-portal/invoices) - invoice listing
E-Fatura XML Export API (/api/invoices/{id}/xml) - UBL-TR 1.2 format generation
XML export content validation (XML declaration, Invoice tag, proper structure)
Dealer creation via admin API for BY-001 setup
Frontend dealer login page (/dealer-login) - form validation and submission
Frontend dealer portal navigation - all tabs (Ürünler, Siparişlerim, Faturalarım)
Frontend product browsing and add to cart functionality
Frontend cart management (quantity updates, item removal)
Frontend order placement workflow with delivery date and notes
Frontend order confirmation and success messaging
Frontend order listing in dealer portal
Frontend invoice listing in dealer portal
Frontend dealer logout functionality
Admin panel E-Fatura XML download functionality
Login page dealer portal link ('Bayi girişi için tıklayın')
Dealer authentication with code=password initial setup
Order creation from dealer portal (SIP-000001 created successfully)
XML file download with correct naming (efatura_FTR-000001.xml)
All dealer portal UI elements with proper data-testid attributes
Responsive design and Turkish localization maintained

success_percentage.backend: 100% (13/13 new dealer portal and XML export tests passed)
success_percentage.frontend: 100% (Complete dealer portal workflow and XML export working)
